results.name: First entry of the vector (M^n)v, where M is the 2 X 2 matrix [[0,-1],[1,4]] and v is the column vector [0,1].
comment: a(n) is the first entry of v[n], where v[n]=Mv[n-1], M is the 2 X 2 matrix [[0, -1], [1, 4]] and v[0] is the column vector [0,1].
Real Pisot roots (the eigenvalues of M): 2-sqrt(3)=0.267949, 2+sqrt(3)=3.73205.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (4,-1).
formula: a(n) = (1/6)*sqrt(3)*[2-sqrt(3)]^n - (1/6)*sqrt(3)*[2+sqrt(3)]^n, with n>=0. - _Paolo P. Lava_, Oct 06 2008
program: (MAGMA) I:=[0,-1]; [n le 2 select I[n] else 4*Self(n-1) - Self(n-2): n in [1..30]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Feb 05 2018
